data.actual_result: Dots of the role color will be at the very bottom of the screen as they get stuck on the Navigation Bar
data.short_description: Role color artifacts at bottom of screen (on top of Navigation Bar) in Server Settings - Members, when scrolling, potentially only on Android 9 as I have mixed CNR and reproduced reports.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with roles, preferably colored - Go to Server Settings - Member list - Scroll down, maybe up, back down
